title: Say You, Say Me (Duet)
lyrics:
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
Say you, say me
Say it for always, that's the way it should be
Say you, say me
Say it together, naturally
[Verse 1: Lionel Richie]
I had a dream, I had an awesome dream
People in the park playing games in the dark
And what they played was a masquerade
And from behind of walls of doubt a voice was crying out
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
Say you, say me
Say it for always, that's the way it should be
Say you, say me
Say it together, naturally
[Verse 2: Jason Aldean & 
Lionel Richie
]
As we go down life's lonesome highway
Seems the hardest thing to do is to find a friend or two
A helping hand someone who understands
That when you feel you've lost your way (
feel you've lost your way
)
You've got someone there to say
I'll show you
I will show you

[Chorus: Jason Aldean, 
Both
, & 
Lionel Richie
]
Say you, say me
Say it for always, that's the way it should be
Say you, 
(say you)
 say me 
(say me)
Say it together, naturally
[Bridge: Lionel Richie & 
Both
]
So you think you know the answers, oh no
Because the whole world has got you dancing, that's right
I'm telling you
It's time to start believing, oh yes
Believing who you are, you are a shining star
[Chorus: Lionel Richie, 
Jason Aldean,
 & 
Both
]
Say you, say me
Say it for always, that's the way it should be
Say you, say me
Say it together, naturally
Say it together, naturally
Say it together, naturally
Say it together,
 (say it together) 
naturally
Say it together,
 (say) 
say it together
 (say it together) naturally
Naturally
